ygData.subject: Re: Various questions forma  young necro
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes you can buy L16 pet in Freeport in the sewers  .  ..  . there is a necro guild there. . . You can get a lot of good spells there . ..  and you can buy the
ygData.messageBody:
Yes you can buy L16 pet in Freeport in the sewers . .. . there is a necro guild there. . .

You can get a lot of good spells there . .. and you can buy the pearl you need for banshee Aura .. .



----- Original Message -----
From: TkAdam@...
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, November 16, 1999 12:23 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Various questions forma young necro


In a message dated 11/16/99 11:47:34 AM Eastern Standard Time,
boffinboy@... writes:

> FInally I hear i can buy my
> lvl 16 pet spell in efreeport in some kind of cave, rather than research -
> is that correct and if so where is this cave?

I am not sure it is there...
it IS in Grobb though, and the Shadowknight guild, along with the level 20
and 24 pet if you want to buy them all at once...
